title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Architectural, Engineering, and Construction Education Design for BIM Technology Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: One can perform 3D modeling and construction simulations using BIM software (e.g., Revit, ArchiCAD).
One can understand BIM-based collaboration processes and communicate efficiently in multidisciplinary team projects.
One can analyze BIM data to propose design optimization and resource management solutions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
